subject: p19731864
Findings: Enlarged heart size is stable since. Mediastinal and hilar contours are unremarkable. Aorta is tortuous in course, unchanged in appearance. There are no lung opacities concerning for pulmonary edema/pneumonia. There is no pleural effusion.
Impression: Moderately enlarged heart size, stable since. No findings concerning for pulmonary edema or pneumonia.
